title: I May Be A Forty-Something Old Guy, But Some Goddess Gave Me Nine Cheat Abilities!
alternative_title: I May Be a Forty-something Old Guy, but Some Goddess Gave Me Nine Cheat Abilities! ; Kami-sama kara Cheat Nouryoku wo 9-ko Morau ; Yosoji no Ossan ; Yosoji no Ossan, Kami-sama kara Cheat Nouryoku wo 9-ko Morau ; 四十路のおっさん、神様からチート能力を9個もらう
status: I May Be a Forty-something Old Guy, but Some Goddess Gave Me Nine Cheat Abilities! ; Kami-sama kara Cheat Nouryoku wo 9-ko Morau ; Yosoji no Ossan ; Yosoji no Ossan, Kami-sama kara Cheat Nouryoku wo 9-ko Morau ; 四十路のおっさん、神様からチート能力を9個もらう
description:
Description :
        Norito Kirishimia is a dreary office worker that's hit by a truck and transferred to another world as Noht Mistland, one of "The Lost." Even though the goddess that accidentally did this gave him nine cheat abilities as an apology, his expectations of a dream-filled easy life stuffed with cheat abilities doesn't last long! He's told that "The Lost" are exploited by the powerful and usually meet a horrific end! Will Noht be able to enjoy this second life with his companions, the holy beast Volf and the great fairy Mana?!
